short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best plugin for website streaming. Browse faster, save content to see it without internet and have the best user experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
XGO Connect acts as a plugin or complement that allows to expand the functions of the websites that have it integrated to optimize the use of cache, video playback, content saving, among others.

XGO Connect will allow your creativity to have no limits when improving the user experience.
